timeline.message: First pass of new biomes stuff
Name MultiNoiseBiomeSource noise generators according to the names we chose

timeline.author: Juuxel

replies.bodyText: Because GRAVEL and SOUL_SAND exist in the superclass, but :thonkjang: created new fields here
replies.author: Earthcomputer

replies.bodyText: Think enigma doesn't allow that. There are public static final fields for gravel and soul sand in the super class SurfaceBuilder. You can just change on github and if it's illegal, travis will just fail and notify you.
replies.author: liach

replies.bodyText: Ah. I think this is that one Enigma bug again (FabricMC/Enigma#191 but for fields this time).
replies.author: Juuxel

replies.bodyText: Yep, we had trouble for loggers in superclass/child class before.
replies.author: liach

timeline.bodyText: Hmm, should we use random or rand? Most code (at least in blocks/items) uses random, which I think looks nicer.
timeline.author: Juuxel
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,5 +1,14 @@
 CLASS net/minecraft/class_3537 net/minecraft/util/math/noise/OctavePerlinNoiseSampler
 	FIELD field_15744 octaveSamplers [Lnet/minecraft/class_3756;
+	METHOD <init> (Lnet/minecraft/class_2919;Lit/unimi/dsi/fastutil/ints/IntSortedSet;)V
+		ARG 1 rand
+		ARG 2 octaves
+	METHOD <init> (Lnet/minecraft/class_2919;Ljava/util/List;)V
+		ARG 1 rand
+		ARG 2 octaves
+	METHOD <init> (Lnet/minecraft/class_2919;Ljava/util/stream/IntStream;)V
+		ARG 1 rand
+		ARG 2 octaves

replies.bodyText: @Earthcomputer though if you name it random, the name will appear red, you have actually successfully named it that way.
replies.author: liach

replies.bodyText: Hmm, I prefer the name rand, but if there's a standard I will change it.
replies.author: Earthcomputer

replies.bodyText: Yet another enigma issue (not showing it as green for outside classes named) so you might've been confused.
replies.author: liach

replies.bodyText: There seems to only be one rand in some 1.15 branch in my repo, and 205 randoms.
replies.author: Juuxel
